name: PIGEONS
description: PIGEONS is a multiplayer fps based on movement mechanics such as sprint, grappling hook, wall run, dash, etc. Use anything as a weapon like bench, chairs, tables, cans, etc. Choose your character between 4 different pigeons (each one has his proper skins)one duck included (characters are pigeons). Team deathmatches will be added soon, now there is two finished maps and the gamemode Free for all. Solo mode will be added soon
